description: [Volt Typhoon](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1017) used [KV Botnet Activity](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0035) to build intermediate communication chains between operators and victims, such as identified access to victims in Guam.(Citation: Lumen KVBotnet 2023)

external_references.description: Black Lotus Labs. (2023, December 13). Routers Roasting On An Open Firewall: The KV-Botnet Investigation. Retrieved June 10, 2024.
